example.name: transitive
example.text: Frankly , the only way [0] I can think of [*T*-3] [0] [*] to accomplish this [*T*-4] is [*] to make it [*EXP*-1] possible for addicts to buy drugs at some regulated place at a price that [*T*-2] approximates their cost .
